item.description:
RESCHEDULED FROM JAN 18 TO JAN 20 DUE TO WEATHER

Please join us for our regular January meetup featuring not just a great potluck supper (6:30pm) but also a how-to session on making soil starting mixes and soil blocking as an alternative to pots, etc. Several meetup members will discuss their mixes (with a focus on affordable, quality and sustainable materials) and at least one member will be demonstrating the soil blocking system! General discussion about seed starting pros/cons is likely to ensue....

Just in time to start your annual veg in February:)

Portland Location To Be Confirmed; Space is limited so please take your RSVP seriously.

6:30 potluck supper
7:00 announcements + discussion/demo
8:30 start wrap-up/cleanup

Please remember to bring your potluck kit (dish/bowl/utensils/mug/napkin) and a dish to share. Please label non-vegetarian offerings.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: January Meetup: Seed Starting Mixes and Soil Blockers
